comment: This is giving some error. Please advise how to fix this

replies.comment: remove the node_modules using rm node-modules, npm install and then try again it should work. Also what I found the package.json has some issues form this tutorial. You need to include FormsModule
In this final template npm start command is showing some error.By running npm run lite it is working.So i changed in package.json also but npm start is not working.Please give me a solution.
